name: Soarvolver
description:
- Soarvolver is a physics based fighting platformer where you face off your friends in a fast paced, action packed, gameplay.
- Use different weapons to blast your friends into oblivion and win - but make sure to keep an eye on your own velocity or you may go flying off to!

Play locally with 2 Xbox 

(For Xbox controllers) 
- A to shoot 
- Left analogue to rotate gun

- If you enjoy it, i'd love to hear! Donations will ensure I complete it!
- If you don't have an Xbox controller, feel free to try Soarvolver with other USB gamepads and let me know how it goes.
